author: Simon Difford
description: A spiced variation on the classic Mojito.
name: Ginger Mojito
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker
Add mint and lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise)
Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice
